jackpot.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a large amount of money that you can win in a game that is decided by chance
jackpot.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a large prize you can win in a LOTTERY (=a game of chance in which people buy tickets with numbers on)
jackpot.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: this week’s £3 million jackpot in the National Lottery
jackpot.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: General Dynamics sees a potential jackpot in these new aircraft.
jackpot.translation[1].definitions[2].de: if a person or organization hits the jackpot, they make a lot of money, or have a big success
jackpot.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: Du Pont chemists have hit the jackpot with this new fiber.
